channel.title: upScale Theme Demo
channel.description: Just another Kriesi.at Theme Demos Sites site

item.title: Textblock
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: For bigger sites with many features, regular drop-down menus typically hide most of the user’s options. As a result, you can’t visually compare all your choices; you have to rely on short-term memory.

item.title: Textblock
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: People have enough on their minds, and messing with short-term memory reduces their ability to accomplish their tasks on your site. Mega-drop-downs let you visually emphasize relationships among items which helps users understand their choices.

item.title: Why this theme?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [one_fifth first] [iconbox title="Layout Builder" icon="layout.png"]Create custom page layouts via drag and drop in  minutes[/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="3D Slideshow" icon="images.png"]3D Slideshow included with fallback jQuery Slideshow[/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="Top support" icon="help.png"]16000 Posts in our support forum. We do care![/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="Video Support" icon="movie.png"]Want to embed multiple videos? Piece of cake! [/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="Shotcodes" icon="write.png"]You should definitley check out our kickass shortcode system![/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [hr_invisible] [one_fifth first] [iconbox title="Lightbox" icon="magnify.png"]The theme uses the beautiful prettyPhoto lightbox[/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="Framework" icon="gears.png"]Built on our very own Avia Framework. We know how to code![/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="Updates" icon="refresh.png"]Follow us on twitter or facebook to get theme updates[/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="Icon Boxes" icon="info.png"]Like these icon boxes? We got more than 30 and you can add your own too![/iconbox] [/one_fifth] [one_fifth] [iconbox title="Get it now!" icon="download.png"]Download the theme now at themeforest[/iconbox] [/one_fifth]
